title: Digging Tools
body: sdqd

title: Digging Tools
body:
About this item

    Planting hoe: robust and efficient: helps to complete planting work quickly and easily, saving time and energy.
    Gardening gadgets: durability: stainless steel material has characteristics such as anti- and wear resistance, which can be used for a long time.
    Planting hand cultivator: wide range of application: suitable for family planting, small garden planting, lawn maintenance, etc.
    Steel gardening tools: portable and lightweight: small size, easy to carry, and suitable for outdoor planting.
    Gardening hoe: lightweight and easy to carry: small and exquisite, easy to carry, and convenient for outdoor use.

title: DJI Mini 2 SE, Lightweight and Foldable Mini Camera Drone with 2.7K Video
body:
About this item

    𝗥𝗲𝗴𝘂𝗹𝗮𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝗳𝗿𝗶𝗲𝗻𝗱𝗹𝘆 - No registration or exam is required for a drone weighing less than 249g. Enjoy the fun of flying without the tedious application process and waiting time.
    𝗙𝗹𝘆 𝗟𝗼𝗻𝗴𝗲𝗿 - A 31-min max flight time delivers extended flights and more aerial opportunities. Whether you're exploring, filming, or just having fun, do it with more confidence and peace of mind.
    𝗝𝘂𝘀𝘁 𝗮 𝗙𝗲𝘄 𝗧𝗮𝗽𝘀 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝗘𝗽𝗶𝗰 𝗜𝗺𝗮𝗴𝗶𝗻𝗴 - The DJI Fly app has easy-to-use shooting templates that allow the drone to automatically fly, record, and generate professional-level videos that can be shared directly on social media.
    𝗔𝗱𝘃𝗮𝗻𝗰𝗲𝗱 𝗧𝗿𝗮𝗻𝘀𝗺𝗶𝘀𝘀𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝗥𝗮𝗻𝗴𝗲 - Get a 10km max transmission range to reliably fly further and capture more. Compared to Wi-Fi, DJI OcuSync is stronger, offering enhanced transmission and improved anti-interference performance.
    𝟯𝟴𝗸𝗽𝗵 (𝗟𝗲𝘃𝗲𝗹 𝟱) 𝗪𝗶𝗻𝗱 𝗥𝗲𝘀𝗶𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗻𝗰𝗲 - DJI Mini 2 SE flies with reliable stability even in winds up to 38kph, letting you fly and capture content with more confidence in more places.
    𝗕𝗲𝗴𝗶𝗻𝗻𝗲𝗿 𝗙𝗿𝗶𝗲𝗻𝗱𝗹𝘆 - With simplified operations, the drone is easy to learn and master quickly, making it ideal for beginners. It has a Return to Home function for added safety, ensuring a worry-free flying experience.
    Note: The DJI RC-N1 cable (lightning connector) is located inside the RC-N1 remote controller.

    * For your safety, please always check and strictly comply with the latest local laws and regulations before flying.
    Due to platform compatibility issues, the DJI Fly app has been removed from Google Play. To ensure a better product usage experience, please log in to the DJI official website to download the latest version of DJI Fly.

title: PUFFTECH RELAXED JACKET
body:
- High-performance padding made with hollow yarn traps the air for extra warmth.
- Water-repellent finish protects against light rain. *The fabric is coated with a water-repellent agent so the effect lasts. The finish is not permanent.
- Diamond quilting and cocoon silhouette for a casual style.
- Hand-washable for easy care.
- Easy to mix and match with T-shirts and voluminous inner layers.
